text: Preston M. Geren, III (born January 29, 1952 in Fort Worth, Texas) was the 20th United States Secretary of the Army from 16 July 2007 to 16 September 2009. He had already been acting United States Secretary of the Air Force, between 29 July 2005 and position he served in until the confirmation of his successor Michael Wynne on 4 November 2005. Geren was also a member of the United States House of Representatives from Texas. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Air Force Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:United States Secretaries of the Army
title: Pete Geren
